Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a healthy plant with enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant without water and show its effects.
The student can draw a plant without light and show its effects.
The student can include patterns in drawings to show how plants need water to live and grow.
The student can include patterns in drawings to show how plants need light to live and grow.
The student can label the parts of the drawing that show water and light availability for the plant.
